title: New: Favela – Future Visions
body:
Having released a handful of tracks across the course of the past couple of years, Leeds singer/producer **Favela** has finally found a home, with Transgressive Records.

With the news of 12″ EP out 29 June, featuring two new tracks, alongside last year’s _Gong, _it appears that Favela is now ready to spread his wings. EP opener, _Future Visions_, is his most soulful release to date, part SOHN, part Rhye – drawing on smooth R&B influences as much as anything. Check it out below.
